Data Fields
fifo_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » FIFO Buffer

FIFO Attributes. More...

#include <fifo.h>

Collaboration diagram for fifo_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines the attributes of a FIFO. The attributes are read-only using I_FIFO_GETATTR.

Data Fields

uint32_t size
 The total number of bytes in the FIFO.
 
uint32_t used
 The number of bytes ready to be read from the FIFO.
 
uint32_t overflow
 If non-zero, indicates data received in the buffer was discarded.
